member.name: T:OBDevices.Michelangelo
member.summary: Represents a class that handles bi-directional communication to a Michelangelo hand + controller (biointerface or Axon Master)

member.name: P:OBDevices.Michelangelo.SelectedDumpMode
member.summary: Selected Dump Mode Set via Function "setDumpMode"

member.name: P:OBDevices.Michelangelo.CocoConversionOffset
member.summary: Offset Conversion for CoContraction

member.name: P:OBDevices.Michelangelo.Status1
member.summary: Status1 of the Michaelangelo Hand (Only available if corresponding Dump is active) 0 ... kein Event 1 ... 4CH 2 ... kurze Kokontraktion 3 ... lange Kokontraktion 4 ... Impuls blau 5 ... Impuls rot 6 ... Langes Auf 7 ... Timeout

member.name: P:OBDevices.Michelangelo.Status2
member.summary: Status 2 of the Michelangelo Hand (Only available if corresponding Dump is active) 0 = fine Pinch 1 = Key Grip 4 = Rotation

member.name: P:OBDevices.Michelangelo.CocoConversionSlope
member.summary: Concontraction Conversion Slope

member.name: P:OBDevices.Michelangelo.BIFVersion
member.summary: Firmware version

member.name: P:OBDevices.Michelangelo.SwitchMatrix
member.summary: Switchmatrix for the hand

member.summary: Available Dump Modes for Michelangelo Hand

member.name: F:OBDevices.Michelangelo.DumpMode.EMG
member.summary: Configures the Michelangelo to retrieve only the EMG data at 100 Hz

member.name: F:OBDevices.Michelangelo.DumpMode.Sensors
member.summary: Configures the Michelangelo to retrieve only the Sensor data at 100 Hz

member.name: F:OBDevices.Michelangelo.DumpMode.EMGandSensors
member.summary: Configures the Michelangelo to retrieve the EMG and Sensor data at 100 Hz

member.summary: Configures the Michelangelo to retrieve 2 channels EMG data at 100 Hz and internal states (switch state, etc)

member.summary: Four Channel Control Signal

member.summary: Long open Signal

member.summary: Michelangelo Moving to neureal position after preset time

member.name: F:OBDevices.Michelangelo.emgData
member.summary: Field containing the current (most actual) EMG data EMGdata of the 8 electrodes + count. count is increased with each data set arriving. check continuity for data loss

member.name: T:OBDevices.Michelangelo.MichelangeloEMGDataArrivedEventHandler
member.summary: Delegate Event containing the current (most actual) EMG data

member.name: E:OBDevices.Michelangelo.Michelangelo_EMG_Arrived
member.summary: Event containing the current (most actual) EMG data

member.name: T:OBDevices.Michelangelo.MichelangeloSensorDataArrivedEventHandler
member.summary: Delegate Event containing the current (most actual) Sensor data Stores the scaled (SI units) internal sensory information Default: main drive angle, thumb angle, force, main drive current, thumb drive current.

member.name: E:OBDevices.Michelangelo.Michelangelo_SensorData_Arrived
member.summary: Event containing the current (most actual) Sensor data Stores the scaled (SI units) internal sensory information Default: main drive angle, thumb angle, force, main drive current, thumb drive current.

member.name: T:OBDevices.Michelangelo.MichelangeloBatteryLevelUpdatedEventHandler
member.summary: Delegate Event containing the current (most actual) BatteryLevel

member.name: E:OBDevices.Michelangelo.MichelangeloBatteryLevelUpdated
member.summary: Event containing the current (most actual) BatteryLevel

member.name: T:OBDevices.Michelangelo.MichelangeloSwitchOccurredEventHandler
member.summary: Deligate Event indicating an occurring switch
member.param: 0 ... no Event 1 ... 4CH 2 ... short Cocontraction 3 ... long Cocontraction 4 ... Impuls blue 5 ... Impuls red 6 ... long open 7 ... Timeout

member.name: E:OBDevices.Michelangelo.MichelangeloSwitchOccurred
member.summary: Event indicating an occurring switch

member.summary: Triggered when Write Event is Finished

member.name: E:OBDevices.Michelangelo.MichelangeloWriteSettingFinished
member.summary: Triggered when Write Event is Finished

member.name: P:OBDevices.Michelangelo.s7DOFControlCommands.HandSpeed
member.summary: get and set the Hand-speed when hand speed is changed, all commands are automatically re-iterated

member.name: F:OBDevices.Michelangelo.nSensors
member.summary: Number of sensors Main drive angle, thumb angle, grip force, Main drive current, thumb current, rotation angle, extension angle, rotation current, flexion current

member.name: F:OBDevices.Michelangelo.setStartStopDump
member.summary: Flag gets set whenever Dump is stopped or started --> Event only triggered once, when dump is stopped or started

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.#ctor
member.summary: Returns coeffA new instance of the Michelangelo class that handles bidirectional communication with an Otto Bock Michelangelo hand + Biointerface

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.updateBatteryLevel
member.summary: Ask hand for its battery level. attach to the .MichelangeloBatteryLevelUpdated event

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.setNeutralPositionTimer(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets time until "neutral position" timer event is set. The Timer event triggers a movement to neutral position. Interval 0s - 31s Values > 32 deactivate the timer

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.Connect
member.summary: Connect to the Michelangelo hand

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.setDumpMode(OBDevices.Michelangelo.DumpMode)
member.summary: Configures the Michelangelo DumpMode DumpMode.EMG: Configures the Michelangelo to retrieve only the EMG data at 100 Hz DumpMode.EMGAndStates: Configures the Michelangelo to retrieve 2 channels EMG data at 100 Hz and internal states (switch state, etc) DumpMode.Sensors Configures the Michelangelo to retrieve only the Sensor data at 100 Hz DumpMode.EMGandSensors Configures the Michelangelo to retrieve the EMG and Sensor data at 100 Hz

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.setDumpMode(System.Int32)
member.summary: Configures the Michelangelo DumpMode using integer

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.StartDump
member.summary: Starts the transmission of the selected data

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.StopDump
member.summary: Stops the transmission of the data

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.ConstOpenHand
member.summary: Opens the hand to full open at coeffA medium level speed

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.ConstCloseHandOpposition
member.summary: Closes the hand to opposition grip at medium level speed

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.ConstCloseHandLater
member.summary: Closes the hand to lateral grip at medium level speed

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.ConstFlexion
member.summary: Flexes the wrist at medium level speed

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.ConstExtension
member.summary: Extends the wrist at medium level speed

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.ConstSupination
member.summary: Rotates the hand counter-clockwise at medium level speed

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.ConstPronation
member.summary: Rotates the hand counteclockwise at medium level speed

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.varOpenHand(System.Byte)
member.summary: Opens the hand to full open at given speed

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.varCloseHandOpposition(System.Byte)
member.summary: Closes the hand to opposition grip at givenspeed

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.varCloseHandLater(System.Byte)
member.summary: Closes the hand to lateral grip at given speed

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.varFlexion(System.Byte)
member.summary: Flexes the wrist at given speed

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.varExtension(System.Byte)
member.summary: Extends the wrist at given speed

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.varSupination(System.Byte)
member.summary: Rotates the hand counter-clockwise at given speed

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.varPronation(System.Byte)
member.summary: Rotates the hand counteclockwise at given speed

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.StopHand
member.summary: Stops the Hand from moving

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.simultaneousMovement(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Performs a simultaneous movement of all movements at the given speeds. speeds may be 0...255 Order: 0: Hand Open, 1: Opposition Grip, 2: MLateral Grip, 3: Pronation speed, 4: Supination speed, 5: Flexion speed, 6: Extension speed The other part of the DOF HAS to be 0, e.g. if Supination != 0, Pronation HAS to be 0.

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.simultaneousMovement(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Performs coeffA simultaneous movement of all movements at the given speeds. Order: 0: Hand Open, 1: Opposition Grip, 2: MLateral Grip, 3: Pronation speed, 4: Supination speed, 5: Flexion speed, 6: Extension speed The other part of the DOF HAS to be 0, e.g. if Supination != 0, Pronation HAS to be 0.

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.setCoCoThreshold(System.Byte,System.Int16)
member.summary: Adjust the Coco threshold. Voltage is calculated from ((HB LB)/1024)*5V Assignment of the Coco channels 1 and 2 to the physical Myo ports #0..#7

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.setCoCoImpulse4ChanTime(System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the time the user has to relax and go under OFF threshold

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.setImpulse4ChanThreshold(System.Byte,System.Int16)
member.summary: Set the threshold (after boost) for the threshold to surpass in order to get into an Impulse or 4 Channel control (same value used)

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.setBoost(System.Byte,System.Double)
member.summary: Multiplier for each channel
member.param: Factor by which to boost, e.g. 1.5

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.enableHand(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables or disables hand movent. If disabled will not move although EMG is present

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.initNeutralSwitchMatrix
member.summary: Resets the switch Matrix to a matrix where no switches are assigned

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.setSwitchMatrixRow(OBDevices.Michelangelo.SwitchEvent,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sets one row in the switch matrix (assigns switch to target)

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.sendSwitchMatrixToHand
member.summary: sends the Switch Matrix to the Hand
member.returns: -3 if matrix is null, -2 or -1 if n_rows or n_cols was not 7 or 5, respectively. 0 if success

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.sendSwitchMatrixToHand(System.Byte[][])
member.summary: sends the Switch Matrix to the Hand
member.returns: -3 if matrix is null, -2 or -1 if n_rows or n_cols was not 7 or 5, respectively. 0 if success

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.setEMGDataFromExternal(System.UInt16[])
member.summary: EMG Data can be set from external

member.name: M:OBDevices.Michelangelo.setDongleSpeed(System.String)
member.summary: Set the dongle speed for the Bluetooth dongle.
